Draw a line grid.

Parameters:
xpos - X position.
ypos - Y position.
width - Width of the grid.
height - Height of the grid.
spacing - The spacing between lines.

Draw a rect grid.

Parameters:
xpos - X position.

height - Height of the Grid.
spacing - Spacing vertical.
sqNum_w - Number of rects at width.
